Feb. 6, 2011 D GBBA Entertainment Contest (Open)
GBBA Entertainments Contest (Open) 0 Entertainments Contest GBBA Entertainment Contest gbba-entertainments-contest
Coleford, Gloucestershire, England, UK Most Entertaining Band: A. W. Parker (Drybrook) Best Soloist: Iestyn Davies, Cornet (Llwydcoed) Youngest Player: George Malpass, Frampton-on-severn. Second Section:- 1. City of Bristol, 2. Forest of Dean, 3. Llwydcoed, 4. Ynyshir. Third Section - 1. Bream. Fourth Section:- 1. Drybrook, 2. Cheltenham, 3. Pangbourne., 4. Frampton.
Feb. 8, 2011, 5:27 p.m. July 8, 2020, 9:35 a.m.
1 A. W. Parker (Drybrook) Band Kevin White
2 City of Bristol Brass Band Ceri Thomas
3 Forest of Dean Brass Martyn Ford
4 Llwydcoed Band Gary Davies
5 Ynyshir Band Dean Evans
7 Cheltenham Silver Angela Shepherd
8 Pangbourne & District Silver Band Stewart Lewins
